entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
